publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-583 Bob Doris: John Reid - Chairman of Celtic Football Club—That the Parliament congratulates John Reid on becoming the next chairman of Celtic Football Club; wishes him all the best in his new job, and hopes that all Scotland’s clubs and our national side continue to do our nation proud.
S3M-583 John Reid - Chairman of Celtic Football Club (lodged on 1 October 2007) Hugh O’Donnell*, Bill Kidd*, Karen Gillon*

S3M-583 Bob Doris: John Reid - Chairman of Celtic Football Club—That the Parliament congratulates John Reid on becoming the next chairman of Celtic Football Club; wishes him all the best in his new job, and hopes that all Scotland’s clubs and our national side continue to do our nation proud. Supported by: Hugh O’Donnell, Bill Kidd, Karen Gillon, Michael Matheson*
